text: Grudge Match is a sports movie. It was released in December 2013. The movie is about major boxing fights. The fights happen after one of the participants is fired from the local shipyard. Robert De Niro plays Billy "The Kid" McDonnen, Sylvester Stallone plays Henry Sharp and Kim Basinger plays Sally. The critics did not give good reviews for Grudge Match. Overall box office was not good. Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Boxing movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Segal Category:2010s sports movies Category:2013 comedy movies
title: Grudge Match
